short_summary: Fishermen's wharf repair, Port of Cap-aux-Meules
description: Fishermen's wharf repair, Port of Cap-aux-Meules. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on FEBRURARY 14, 2023. PWGSC is issuing this REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for Fishermen’s wharf repair, Port of Cap-aux-Meules.
duration_in_months: Some maintenance is expected to continue thereafter.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the repair of the Fishermen’s Wharf at the Port of Cap-aux-Meules.

## Key Dates and Information

*   **Publication Date:** January 20, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** February 14, 2023 (14:00 HNE)
*   **Amendment Date:** February 14, 2023
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 15, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** February 15, 2023

## Tender Information

*   **Procurement Category:** Construction
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding
*   **Region of Delivery:** Quebec
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Bid Submission Requirements

*   All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 14:00 HNE on February 14, 2023. 
*   Late bids will be considered non-responsive.

## Request for Proposal Documents

*   The RFP and supporting documentation can be accessed online at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15188567?extsite=MTUxODg1NjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15188567?extsite=MTUxODg1NjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

## Contact Information

*   For more information, please contact Maude Roy-Lippe at maude.roy-lippe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
